localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: 1Question asks a quick study question before granting children access to their favorite apps...like sneaking vegetables into cake! Instead of complete restriction, 1Question creates unlimited opportunities for children to learn as they play.
blogPost.body: 1Question asks a quick study question before granting children access to their favorite apps...like sneaking vegetables into cake! Instead of complete restriction, 1Question creates unlimited opportunities for children to learn as they play.
blogPost.title: 1Question - Turning your child's screen time into study time!
blogPost.author: Ann Elnekave

localize.description: 在给孩子们访问他们最喜欢的应用程序之前，问题会问一个快速学习的问题……比如把蔬菜偷偷放到蛋糕里！1Query不是完全的限制，而是为孩子们创造了无限的机会，让他们在游戏中学习。
localize.tagline: 把孩子看电视的时间变成学习时间！

localize.description: 在給孩子們訪問他們最喜歡的應用程序之前，問題會問一個快速學習的問題……比如把蔬菜偷偷放到蛋糕裏！1Query不是完全的限制，而是爲孩子們創造了無限的機會，讓他們在遊戲中學習。
localize.tagline: 把孩子看電視的時間變成學習時間！

previous.excerpt: DuoQi is a 65W Gallium Nitride (GaN) charger which integrates a foldable 15W double-sided wireless charging pad, a USB-A 3.0 and a Type-C PD charging port.
previous.title: DuoQi - The 1st 65W GaN Charger w/ Wireless Charging Pad

localize.description: DuoQi是一款65W氮化镓(GaN)充电器，它集成了一个可折叠的15W双面无线充电板、一个USB-A 3.0和一个Type-C PD充电口。
localize.tagline: 第1个65W GaN无线充电板充电器

localize.description: DuoQi是一款65W氮化鎵(GaN)充電器，它集成了一個可摺疊的15W雙面無線充電板、一個USB-A 3.0和一個Type-C PD充電口。
localize.tagline: 第1個65W GaN無線充電板充電器

next.excerpt: Plan the things you love to do with your friends both online and in person. Make plans with friends, share plans, see what others are up to, and keep track of upcoming events. Plan get-togethers, brunch, study sessions, your next date, you name it!
next.title: Planmesh - The easiest way to plan with friends

localize.description: 计划您喜欢的事情，与您的朋友在线和亲自做。与朋友一起制定计划，分享计划，看看其他人在做什么，并跟踪即将到来的活动。计划聚餐、早午餐、学习课程、下一次约会，你说的都可以。
localize.tagline: 最简单的和朋友一起计划的方法

localize.description: 計劃您喜歡的事情，與您的朋友在線和親自做。與朋友一起制定計劃，分享計劃，看看其他人在做什麼，並跟蹤即將到來的活動。計劃聚餐、早午餐、學習課程、下一次約會，你說的都可以。
localize.tagline: 最簡單的和朋友一起計劃的方法
